Title: Start/Stop Timer
Description: Verify timer functionality for a task
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task
Steps: Click Start Timer button on a task.

Title: Export Time Data
Preconditions: User is logged in and has recorded time

Title: View Time Stats
Description: Verify Time Stats view is accessible

Title: View Time Stats
Steps: Verify all filter buttons present (Today, Week, Month, Year, Custom).

Title: Filter Stats: Week
Preconditions: User has tracked time this week

Title: Filter Stats: Month
Preconditions: User has tracked time this month

Title: Filter Stats: Year
Preconditions: User has tracked time this year

Title: Stats Data Display
Steps: Check for Total Time or Charts.
